member.name: T:MindFusion.Diagramming.Wpf.Import.VisioImporter
member.summary: Imports Visio 2003 XML Drawing files (*.vdx) into MindFusion.Diagramming.

member.name: M:MindFusion.Diagramming.Wpf.Import.VisioImporter.Import(System.String)
member.summary: Imports all pages from the specified Visio document into a single DiagramDocument object.
member.param: A full path to the Visio VDX file.

member.name: M:MindFusion.Diagramming.Wpf.Import.VisioImporter.ImportAllPages(System.String,MindFusion.Diagramming.Wpf.Diagram)
member.summary: Imports all pages from the specified Visio document.
member.param: A full path to the Visio VDX file.
Reference to the diagram where the Visio drawing is imported.

member.name: M:MindFusion.Diagramming.Wpf.Import.VisioImporter.ImportPage(System.String,MindFusion.Diagramming.Wpf.Diagram,System.Int32)
member.summary: Imports a single page from the specified Visio document.
member.param: A full path to the Visio VDX file.
Reference to the Diagram where the Visio page is imported.
Specifies which page of the Visio document to import.

member.name: M:MindFusion.Diagramming.Wpf.Import.VisioImporter.GetPageCount(System.String)
member.summary: Determines how many pages are there in a Visio diagram.
member.param: A full path to the Visio VDX file.
member.returns: An integer value specifying the number of pages in the Visio diagram.

member.summary: Getting VDX node attribute or text

String Name of the attribute or "" for [Text]

member.summary: Suppress usage of unmanaged code.

member.name: P:MindFusion.Diagramming.Wpf.Import.VisioImporter.ApplyVisioUnit

member.name: T:MindFusion.Diagramming.Wpf.Import.Visio2013Importer
member.summary: Imports Visio 2013 XML Drawing files (*.vsdx) into Diagram or DiagramDocument objects.

member.name: M:MindFusion.Diagramming.Wpf.Import.Visio2013Importer.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the Visio2013Importer class.

member.name: M:MindFusion.Diagramming.Wpf.Import.Visio2013Importer.Import(System.String)
member.summary: Imports the specified Visio Graphics Service VSDX file into a new DiagramDocument, where each Visio page is imported into a separate DiagramPage of the DiagramDocument.
member.param: A string specifying the path to the .vsdx file.
member.returns: A DiagramDocument containing the imported Visio drawing.

member.name: M:MindFusion.Diagramming.Wpf.Import.Visio2013Importer.Import(System.String,MindFusion.Diagramming.Wpf.DiagramDocument)
member.summary: Imports the specified Visio Graphics Service VSDX file into an existing DiagramDocument, where each Visio page is imported into a separate DiagramPage of the DiagramDocument.
member.param: A string specifying the path to the .vsdx file.
A DiagramDocument into which to import the Visio drawing.

member.name: M:MindFusion.Diagramming.Wpf.Import.Visio2013Importer.Import(System.String,MindFusion.Diagramming.Wpf.Diagram)
member.summary: Imports the specified Visio Graphics Service VSDX file into the specified Diagram.
member.param: A string specifying the path to the .vsdx file.
A Diagram into which to import the Visio drawing.

member.name: M:MindFusion.Diagramming.Wpf.Import.Visio2013Importer.OnImportItem(System.Object,MindFusion.Diagramming.Wpf.Import.ImportItemEventArgs)
member.summary: Raises the ImportItem event.

member.name: P:MindFusion.Diagramming.Wpf.Import.Visio2013Importer.PagesPerRow
member.summary: Gets or sets how many Visio pages to import on a row before offsetting the import location vertically.

member.name: E:MindFusion.Diagramming.Wpf.Import.Visio2013Importer.ImportItem
member.summary: Raised for each shape's XML element in the imported VSDX drawing to let you create a custom diagram item representing the Visio shape.

member.summary: Contains the arguments passed to handlers of the ConnectorImported event.

member.summary: Gets the Visio shape identifier.

member.summary: Gets the XML DOM element corresponding to the Visio document's XML code that describes the imported shape.

member.summary: Contains the arguments passed to handlers of the GroupImported event.

member.summary: Contains the arguments passed to handlers of the ImportItem event.
